April 5, 2019 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pivotal-cloud-foundry-2-5-istio-envoy-make-your-developers-more-productive?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Pivotal Cloud Foundry 2.5 is Now GA! Learn how PCF 2.5 harnesses the power of Istio and Envoy to make your developers more productive. Check it Out <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pivotal-cloud-foundry-2-5-istio-envoy-make-your-developers-more-productive?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/cloud-native-buildpacks-for-kubernetes-and-beyond?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Cloud Native Buildpacks: An Industry-Standard Build Process For Kubernetes and Beyond We've teamed up with Heroku to create Cloud Native Buildpacks—helping you unlock developer productivity and bring the power of buildpacks to Kubernetes.
